question: Which city is choosed to host the 2022 Commonwealth Games?
explanation: Louise Martin, president of the Commonwealth Games Federation announced Birmingham as host city of the 2022 Commonwealth Games.The Common Wealth Games is to be hosted in England for the first time since Manchester hosted the Games in 2002. The expenses of the Common Wealth Games is expected to be around £750m. The government would cover £560m. The local council would contribute around £180m.
